entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with flurries and rain showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Rain showers early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
